Empath::

Empath couldn't care less about Nightlight, but she won't abandon 
Windlord, and flies to the attack, spraying Kitkat with plasma fire.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Windlord:
> 
> "Empath, my love, can you come to give us a hand"tought Windlord 
> while he showed with his mind what was going on there
>
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Windlord:
> > 
> > Windlord saw the shot came and he took off, he just lost few 
> > feathers. "By Primus... " said Windlord sarcysticaly "It seems 
> that 
> > it's a witch convention here..."
> > 
> > He shot two feather-missiles against Kitkat.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > KitKat::
> > > 
> > > She had transformed into wolf mode and ran out of the base. She 
> > ran 
> > > hard and made her way to the battle field. She transformed into 
> > bot 
> > > mode and drew her plasma pistol. She raised it as started 
> shooting 
> > > Windlord."Die Bot!"
> > > 
> > > 
> > > Battera::
> > > 
> > > She swooped down and went to hit SharpClaw with her huge bat 
> > > wing. "Take that you vile creature. May the matrix have great 
> pity 
> > on 
> > > your spark!"
